column4: Ahoi, ist es möglich, im Nautilus (Dateimanager) sich eine bitgenaue Dateigröße anzeigen zu lassen?
Is it possible to get shown the bitexact size of a file in Nautilus?
ok, that's what I meant, sry.
right-click -> Properties -> look at size field
is exactly not what I was looking for ...
what exactly are you looking for, then?
do you want to kidding me?
no, I'm not. you can't add size in bytes to list view in Nautilus.
'add ...' Haeh? Are u sure u understand me?
feel free to ask #ubuntu-de, they'll tell you the same thing.
again, this is not something you can do in Nautilus' list view.
because nobody programmed it as an option
it's mentioned in #ubuntu's terms of service, which are linked from the channel entry message.
in a second level of reachability ... that means not existant
considering that "Use of this channel implies acceptance of terms at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IRC/TermsOfService", users should read that page and be aware of it anyway.
